reviews.review: I really enjoy playing this game. For those who are worried about it being too scary, the scariness goes away after a few rounds, and just leaves you feeling tense. Playing survivor is fun, and the team work aspect is awesome, and playing killer feels amazing once you figure out who you're good at. If you can, get this game with a few of your friends and play custom matches together, with one being killer. That is always hilarious and fun (or rage inducing). :)
It`s so funny!!! When you play with a friend it becomes 1000x more funnier

As of this stage of the game (11/2/2019), things are looking up. Some things are still broken, but overall, the game is in a better place than it has been. The devs listen, and things are good, I would absolutely recommend it.
excelente juego para entrar solo o en equipo muy bueno para pasar el rato y que te den unos buenos sustos

Es uno de los mejores juegos que he conocido de terror y es muy barato para lo que es.
Lo recomiendo sin dudarlo.

Play this Game. FO SHO FO SHO
Ist ein Super spiel. Macht viel Spaß

Dead by daylight..
how can i describe it? tough getting into, and it does take a massive grind to get to the point of enjoyment. OVR it is an amazing super fun game but like every other game it has its problem. personally i really dislike the community due to its toxicity but i have managed to find some friends who arent toxic. if you are in to toxicity you will no doubt love the community. once you reach purple ranks and gain a little knowledge and skill it is super fun. nothing feels better than 360ing killers all day. i feel like the game also rewards you quite a bit for playing. the customization is amazing and so is the perk and bloodpoint system. you can never get to the point where you know everything and have everything. its a forever grind and i love that. i have almost a 1000 hours i think and i dont even have all the survivor perks in the game which is what i play the most. but enough with the good stuff. the game also has its problems. like i already mentioned the community. the toxic community literally gives me a headache sometimes. There are also a lot of issues and unbalance problems the game struggles with. Its the kind of game that will never be completely balanced and there will always be a meta. however the devs do regularly try to fix these and looks to the community for help compared to other games such as FIFA. i would definetely recommend this game to you if you are in need of a good horror yet gameplay focused grind game. i promise you that if you play this game long enough you will get addicted and it will get fun. there are always some days where its just not fun but for real - this is a good investment.
If you want to waste your life on this game like I do, go for it. Just prepare for a toxic community, a ton of bugs and devs that ''did a pretty good job so far''
es un juego increible. desde que lo jugue se volvio un juego de mis favoritos es muy dificil aburrirse con el juego. y lo recomiendo much
除了老喜欢掉·~~~没什么其他的毛病· 很好哈哈哈哈哈~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Хотя бы уникальных карт добавить для каждого из маньяков, где цели у выживших и маньяков будут поразнообразнее.
В остальном игра хороша, но может надоесть очень быстро.
Great game to have fun and play with friends

Well first of all ik that my hours isn't that much but I just got it on pc and  played the game first on console (it's kinda obvious why I got the pc version) the game is awesome even when ur playing solo unless ur not a lone wolf then find a friend I played over 500 hours solo (on console) the community isn't that big of a problem unless u get ur feelings hurt easily the biggest problem is the waiting time it's not as bad as console but still I have to wait like 15 to 30 mins just to play a game  that's basically the only problems with the game the rest isn't that big and some of the dlcs are good and some ain't just deal with it well I have been typing too much so I'll just shut my mouth and give this game a 8.5/10

Если вам не во что поиграть накануне, то эта несложная игра для вас. Только будьте осторожны! В процессе игры вы можете испытывать извержение мата из вашего рта и неистовое тепло в очке. Со временем вы привыкните к багам и постоянному вылету из игры >3<
Nice game and fun to play for a loooong time
el juego es 10 de 10 el unico problema es los dlcs que son re caros, pero vale la pena
Fun game to play when your board with all of the killers to hide from and all the tactics to use!

The playerbase is like eight/tenths cancer, it's riddled with more bugs than a flyover country truck stop bathroom after every patch, and the developers have done a pretty good job so far... 

BUT the core gameplay loop is addictive enough that I've put around a thousand hours into it over four ish years and I'm terrible about sticking with games for any length of time so even despite the flaws it's definitely worth playing, One of the few worthy asymetric multiplayer experiences remaining, and the only Horror one that's stood the test of time.

Very fun game i love the aspect of leviling up your charactor and things like that. But what is bad is that killers face camp and somethimes only go for you which sucks becuase you can't play the game, when they do that.

lo recomiendo pero las skins para mi punto de vista son muy caras el juego es muy bueno incluso yo me e comprado asesinos pero las skins son tan caras que hasta te compras dos asesinos en lugar de una skin por eso el juego es muy bueno lo recomiendo pero si eres alguien que no tiene dinero para comprar skins mejor pillate un asesino muy bueno el juego me encanta

マッチングはしないわマッチングしても不明なエラーで飛ばされるわまともにゲーム出来ないバグや不具合は多いわでクソゲーと化しています。鯖優先とかキラー不利とかは思いませんがゲームをしたくてもゲームが始まらないのでどうしようもありません。南無。

Muito divertido para jogar com os amigos, da para ser bem competitivo aprendendo taticas para tentar ganhar todas as vezes. Também é possivel passar raiva por ser o alvo a todo o tempo. Mas é, em geral, muito divertido.

2. November 2019: Sehr sehr geiles Game!
Besonders gut, wenn man mit Freunden spielt und gemeinsam entkommt. (oder seine Freunde an den Haken hängt :D)
Muss leider sagen, dass es teilweise sehr unausgeglichen ist/sein kann und man da noch ein wenig dran arbeiten sollte.
Ich empfehle es dennoch jedem weiter, der auf so leichten Multiplayer-Horror und Quick Time Events steht.
Edit - short translation: pretty awesome game! espacially with friends. partly unbalanced, but for every one who likes multiplayer horror games and quick time events.

27. Juli 2020: I have never played it as often as I have lately and now I am really confused about this community. Almost every time (when I play killer) and someone dies in a match, I get called a "tunneler" or "camper", even if I really try to give the survivors many chances to let them escape and do generators. I hate how mad some people can get.
Survive with friends is literally the best part of the game, so please dont be that toxic gamer.

Ich mag das Spiel einfach. Klar es ist nicht perfekt aber ich finde das nicht schlimm da durch bugs oder andere fehler meistens lustige situationen zustande gebracht werden und das konzept hinter dem spiel finde ich einfach nur großartig und gruselig hihi

Dead by daylight can get repetitive, but at least to me that doesn't matter just because of how fun it is. Though after like the 30 hour mark, it can get boring without some friends in a party to play with if you play it often.
